alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:59AM CDT until April 02 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Wilcox and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. At 43.0 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 45.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to gradually fall through the day today, falling below flood stage by early Sunday morning. The river is forecast to continue falling to a stage of 25.7 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
